actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the definition of "rural area" in the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act and title V of the Housing Act of 1949 in order to permit towns of 25,000 or less inhabitants to be considered rural areas for purposes of those acts.

summary.text: Revises the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act and the Housing Act of 1949 by redefining "rural area" to permit towns of twenty-five thousand or less inhabitants to be considered rural areas for purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the definition of "rural area" in the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act and title V of the Housing Act of 1949 in order to permit towns of 25,000 or less inhabitants to be considered rural areas for purposes of those acts.
